title: Classic
description: Lightweight and versatile. The default weapon for all is an instant classic.

title: Shorty
description: Surprise your enemy up close for max effectiveness.

title: Frenzy
description: Up close, hold the trigger. From afar...try something else.

title: Ghost
description: Sleek, silenced, and proficient at any range.

title: Sheriff
description: A modern six-shooter for the headshot searcher.

title: Stinger
description: They'll know it's over when the Stinger splash hits.

title: Spectre
description: When in doubt, the Spectre is your number one.

title: Bucky
description: Attacker. Defender. You're the one with the pump-action shotgun.

title: Judge
description: Automatic, rapid fire shotgun that provides sustained high damage.

title: Bulldog
description: Some kind of happiness is measured out in taking down enemies with the Bulldog.

title: Guardian
description: Shines in the hands of a patient shooter.

title: Phantom
description: A balanced weapon built for stable, extended shots.

title: Vandal
description: This accurate powerhouse is frecious in small bursts.

title: Marshal
description: Hold an angle, breathe, and they'll regret turning that corner.

title: Operator
description: Get cozy and you can control important ground.

title: Ares
description: Don't mistake it's size for clunk.

title: Odin
description: Wielding this hammer of a machine threatens glory for the holder and ruin for the foe.
